description: The pipes you'll create to transport the many liquids and gasses can only contain a single type of fluid at a time and they wont connect directly to empty pipes or containers and machines automatically, so make sure to use that wrench to configure them properly.

You can forcefully initiate a connection by right-clicking the center of the pipe with your wrench, or by right-clicking a block with a pipe in your hand; thought it won't consume the pipe, just connect it.
Every tick, the fluid pipe will attempt to evenly extract from all connected blocks and then attempt to insert that into all other connected blocks.

Here's a few other tips you might enjoy, use them wisely and abuse them to your complete advantage: You can have up to 3 pipes in a single block for ultimate compact-ness! Luckily, pipes of different color will --never-- connect. Finally, right-clicking a pipe with a wrench will change the connection type and shift-right-clicking will drop the pipe.
